## Required tools for version control

- Git

- An account on a Version Control System (VCS) (e.g. Gitlab, Github, Bitbucket)

- A Git GUI (GUI = General User Interface)


## Recommended resources for Git/Github

### Presentation slides

- Git for humans (by Alice Barlett): <https://speakerdeck.com/alicebartlett/git-for-humans>


### Books

- Happy Git and Github for the useR (by Jenny Bryan): <http://happygitwithr.com/>


### Videos
